name: Chaotic Death
description:
Also on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/782924

At death's gates you still attempt to fight, as your health decreases you still plan to stay alive, and face death to get back to full health.

 #Wowiejam Theme Failure is Progress! Messing around with the concepts of wining or losing.

Dying in this game without facing the main boss takes you to a secondary boss fight  where it earns you point to progress but once you progress to the final boss and LOSE  you have to restart from all over.

 

 

#games #Wowiegamejam #Skill #bloom #game #gamejam #Wowie #Jonas #Willyousnail #topdown #action #Hardcore
